title: Artistic Sanctuary in Trendy Grunwald – Luxury 2 Bedroom Open-Concept Apartment
description: This sophisticated, newly-built apartment boasts an expansive 74 sqm of luminous, thoughtfully designed living space. The open floor plan offers flexibility perfect for artists, featuring sun-kissed interiors, Oak parquet floors, and curated lighting. Two capacious bedrooms flank a stylish luxury bathroom, while full accessibility guarantees effortless movement for all residents. Secure EV charging, a welcoming shared sauna, and tranquil fenced gardens complete this premier residence.
neighborhood_description: Set within the dynamic Grunwald district of Poznań, this property enjoys proximity to modern urban living at its finest: designer boutiques, creative studios, lively cafés, and top local dining punctuate the area. Well-connected by extensive public transport and cycle routes, moments away from green parks and reputable schools. Grunwald’s chic, modern development draws a community of professionals and creatives alike.
lifestyle_benefits: Ideal for artists and creatives seeking inspiration
Access to community sauna for unwinding
Excellent shopping and dining steps away
target_buyer: Perfect for artists, designers, remote professionals, and urban tastemakers looking for a stylish, functional living space amidst Poznan’s creative pulse.
market_positioning: Positioned as a premium, luxe offering in Grunwald’s new housing stock, attracting discerning buyers. Its blend of top-tier artistry-focused amenities and connectivity places it above standard market options in Poznań’s western districts.
